item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we cant offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you havent received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If youve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, youll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasnt marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We dont guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" wpex_bg_overlay="dark" remove_bottom_col_margin="true" css=".vc_custom_1660679795117{background: #333333 url(https://total.wpexplorer.com/pottery/wp-content/uploads/sites/74/2022/08/jocelyn-morales-giRMqme_f-Q-unsplash-scaled.jpg?id=165) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" wpex_bg_overlay_opacity="15%" min_height="100vh"][vc_column][vcex_spacing size="clamp(100px, 8vw, 140px)"][vcex_heading text="Hand-Crafted Pottery since 1975" align="center" tag="h1" font_size="clamp(40px, 8vw, 60px)" color="#ffffff" text_align="center" line_height="tight" width="700px"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vcex_button onclick="internal_link" text_source="custom_text" internal_link="url:https%3A%2F%2Ftotal.wpexplorer.com%2Fpottery%2Fshop%2F|title:Shop" align="center"]Shop Now[/vcex_button][vcex_spacing size="clamp(100px, 8vw, 140px)"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin="true"][vc_column][vcex_spacing size="5vw"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="middle" column_spacing="40"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_image align="center" image_id="171" img_height="740" img_width="560"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text font_size="20px"]Our Handmade Stoneware Pottery is all made in California, USA. We've been creating beautiful handmade pottery for decades now, each and every piece made with love and devotion.

Shop for kitchenware, dinnerware, bakeware, home decor and plant pots. All of our products are made with the purest and safe ingredients and meant to last a lifetime![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin="true"][vc_column][vcex_spacing size="calc(7vw - 40px)"][vcex_heading text="Our handmade pottery is the perfect gift for any occasion." bottom_margin="15px" align="center" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="42px" width="800px"][vcex_button onclick="internal_link" text_source="custom_text" internal_link="url:https%3A%2F%2Ftotal.wpexplorer.com%2Fpottery%2Fshop%2F|title:Shop" align="center" style="plain-text"]Start Shopping →[/vcex_button][vcex_spacing size="7vw"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row wpex_bg_overlay="dark" remove_bottom_col_margin="true" css=".vc_custom_1660685224244{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background: rgba(151,139,129,0.64) url(https://total.wpexplorer.com/pottery/wp-content/uploads/sites/74/2022/05/nordwood-themes-SM3hDC6phTM-unsplash.jpg?id=187) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;*background-color: rgb(151,139,129) !important;}" wpex_bg_overlay_opacity="35%"][vc_column][vcex_spacing size="6vw"][vcex_heading text="Join our Mailing List" text_align="center" color="#ffffff"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text align="center" width="600px" text_align="center" color="#ffffff"]Subscribe to our newsletter and receive a 10% Off coupon for your next order and stay in the loop for new products and promotions.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="35px"][vcex_newsletter_form input_align="center" fullwidth_mobile="true" gap="15px" input_width="450px" submit_text_transform="capitalize" submit_font_size="1em" submit_letter_spacing="wide" input_border="0px"][vcex_spacing size="6vw"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
